scripts.start: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { const filePath = path.join(__dirname, 'public', req.url === '/' ? 'index.html' : req.url); const ext = path.extname(filePath); const contentType = ext === '.html' ? 'text/html' : ext === '.js' ? 'text/javascript' : ext === '.css' ? 'text/css' : 'text/plain'; fs.readFile(filePath, (err, data) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not found'); } else { res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentType }); res.end(data); } }); }); server.listen(3001, () => console.log('Frontend running at http://localhost:3001'));"
